channel.title: Need help rep ++
channel.description: Im trying to change the ::donate and ::vote commands on my server to my website but im not sure how if you guys could help it would be great

item.title: Need help rep ++
item.dc:creator: @RaPz RaPz
item.description:
@RaPz wrote:

try this for both
if (playerCommand.equals(“donate”)) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“insert you website here”, 12001);
c.sendMessage(“Donate to keep the server running :)”);
}

and

if (playerCommand.equals("vote")) {
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("your website here", 12000);
					c.sendMessage("Please vote every day!");
				}

place with other commands in commands.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need help rep ++
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Depends on server version. I believe it in client.java for 317, for 562 its in commandpackethandler.java and commandspackethandler.java. Not sure for 508, 614 or any of the other versions.

Read full topic
